title: Small Blue Diamond
description:
A small version of the large blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
apple_vendor_description: The small blue diamond emoji on Apple devices sparkles with a cool, rich sapphire hue, presented with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that makes its facets gleam with life. Realistic lighting catches its edges, creating bright highlights and deep shadows that give it a precious, gem-like quality. On Apple devices, this exquisite blue diamond symbolizes purity, value, and trustworthiness, often used to represent something precious, a good idea, or a compliment.
